summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Rexagon Minecraft Server website iteration 2. All 22 backend API tests passed (100%). All UI features tested including new admin edit modals and profile page redesign.

issues: Theme images show broken image placeholders (404) - expected as sample theme URLs are wiki URLs that may not load directly
Mixed content warning: HTTP cravatar.eu requests on HTTPS site. Browser auto-upgrades to HTTPS but should use https://cravatar.eu directly

action_items: Consider changing cravatar.eu URLs from http:// to https:// to avoid mixed content warnings (low priority - browser auto-upgrades)
critical_code_review_comments: CONSOLE WARNING: HTML hydration warning in AdminPage - <span> cannot be a child of <tbody>, <tr> cannot be a child of <span>. This is from React development wrapper elements in table. Minor cosmetic issue that doesn't affect functionality.
seed_data_creation: Created test themes, test market items, and test news via API during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features working correctly. Backend PUT endpoints for themes, market items, and news all functional. Profile page redesign complete with full-width hero banner and two-column layout. Admin panel edit modals working for Market, News, and Themes tabs. Cravatar.eu is used everywhere for avatars (Navigation, Profile, HomePage leaderboards).

mocked_apis.POST /api/market/satin-al/{urun_id}: Returns placeholder minecraft command instead of real server integration

profile_page_redesign.full_width_hero_banner: PASS - Full-width banner with Minecraft background at top
profile_page_redesign.two_column_layout: PASS - Left column (2/3): Bio, Stats, Account Date. Right column (1/3): Themes
profile_page_redesign.no_admin_panel_button: PASS - No 'Yönetim Paneli' button on profile page

admin_panel_edit_modals.market_edit_buttons: PASS - 7 edit (pencil) buttons found on market items
admin_panel_edit_modals.market_edit_modal: PASS - Popup modal opens with fields: isim, aciklama, fiyat, kategori, stok, gorsel, indirim
admin_panel_edit_modals.news_edit_buttons: PASS - 2 edit buttons found on news items
admin_panel_edit_modals.news_edit_modal: PASS - Popup modal opens with fields: baslik, icerik
admin_panel_edit_modals.themes_edit_buttons: PASS - 6 edit buttons found on themes
admin_panel_edit_modals.themes_edit_modal: PASS - Popup modal opens with fields: isim, gorsel_url, fiyat

cravatar_eu_usage.navigation_avatar: PASS - Logged-in user avatar uses cravatar.eu/helmavatar/{username}/32
cravatar_eu_usage.homepage_leaderboards: PASS - All 8 avatars in En Çok Kredi and Son Kayıtlar use cravatar.eu
cravatar_eu_usage.admin_users_table: PASS - User avatars in admin panel use cravatar.eu

backend_put_endpoints.PUT /api/admin/themes/{theme_id}: PASS - Creates and updates theme successfully
backend_put_endpoints.PUT /api/admin/market/urun/{urun_id}: PASS - Creates and updates market item successfully
backend_put_endpoints.PUT /api/admin/haber/{haber_id}: PASS - Creates and updates news successfully
